name: MaaRoof
description:
So I created the game in Jam over about four days. 

The idea was to use existing components as much as possible and reduce the creation of new things. So I used Unity microgame and added a pack of different components.

That way I reuse existing things instead of creating them and reduce the amount of things I created from scratch.

Among other things, I used a model of a gun that I already had and in fact the only things I created from scratch are the watermelon stand and the enemies.
